segments.text: I’m absolutely disgusted by the mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is just pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing on furniture to steal cookies, and no one is stopping them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share of the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets if it hasn’t already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so messy and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
